rev.diff:
Line 22: Line 22:
'''AnyDVD''' is a [[Microsoft Windows]] [[device driver|driver]] allowing decryption of [[DVD]]s [[on-the-fly]], as well as targeted removal of copy preventions and [[User operation prohibition| user operation prohibitions (UOPs)]]. With an upgrade, it will also do the same for [[HD DVD]] and [[Blu-ray Disc|Blu-ray]]. The AnyDVD program runs in the background, making discs unrestricted and [[Regional lockout|region-free]]. In addition to removing digital restrictions, AnyDVD will also defeat [[Macrovision]] [[Macrovision#Content_protection_.28RipGuard_and_Analog_Copy_Protection.29|analog copy prevention]]. Analog prevention distorts the video signal to prevent high quality copying from the output. AnyDVD is also able to remove copy-prevention from [[Sound recording|audio]] CDs.
'''AnyDVD''' is a [[Microsoft Windows]] [[device driver|driver]] allowing decryption of [[DVD]]s [[on-the-fly]], as well as targeted removal of copy preventions and [[User operation prohibition| user operation prohibitions (UOPs)]]. With an upgrade, it will also do the same for [[HD DVD]] and [[Blu-ray Disc|Blu-ray]]. The AnyDVD program runs in the background, making discs unrestricted and [[Regional lockout|region-free]]. In addition to removing digital restrictions, AnyDVD will also defeat [[Macrovision]] [[Macrovision#Content_protection_.28RipGuard_and_Analog_Copy_Protection.29|analog copy prevention]]. Analog prevention distorts the video signal to prevent high quality copying from the output. AnyDVD is also able to remove copy-prevention from [[Sound recording|audio]] CDs.
â
As of version 6.1.4.3, AnyDVD has a revised ripper that removes [[Sony]] [[ARccOS]], Macrovision [[Macrovision#RipGuard|RipGuard]], and other structural preventions and repairs both intentional and unintentional mastering errors. It ensures strict compliance with third-party tools, particularly [[DVD Shrink]] and Nero Recode.
+
As of version 6.1.4.3, AnyDVD has a revised ripper that removes [[Sony]] [[ARccOS]], [[Macrovision]] [[Macrovision#RipGuard|RipGuard]], and other structural preventions and repairs both intentional and unintentional mastering errors. It ensures strict compliance with third-party tools, particularly [[DVD Shrink]] and Nero Recode.
The ripper module is based on code from Elby's [[CloneDVD]]. Previous versions used a ripper based on FixVTS, but FixVTS was recently shut down by legal threats from Sony.
The ripper module is based on code from Elby's [[CloneDVD]]. Previous versions used a ripper based on FixVTS, but FixVTS was recently shut down by legal threats from Sony.
